column4: Wall Street ends flat as commodity drop caps gains
column5: Wall Street was little changed on Monday  as a better-than-expected start to corporate earnings season boosted investor confidence  but gains were curbed by a drop in commodities.

column4: Options traders grow more bullish on big tech names
column5: NEW YORK Trading in a key technology fund's options showed signs of growing bullishness on Monday ahead of earnings reports this week from big names in the sector  including Apple Inc   International Business Machines  and Microsoft Corp .

column4: Microsoft to buy Israeli cyber security firm Adallom: report
column5: TEL AVIV Microsoft Corp plans to acquire Israeli cyber security company Adallom for $320 million  the Calcalist financial newspaper reported on Monday.

column4: Microsoft to buy Israeli cyber security firm Adallom -report
column5: TEL AVIV  July 20 Microsoft Corp plans to acquire Israeli cyber security company Adallom for $320 million  the Calcalist financial newspaper reported on Monday.

column4: Qualcomm preparing to lay off several thousand employees: tech website
column5: Chipmaker Qualcomm Inc is preparing to lay off several thousand employees  or more than 10 percent of its 30 000-strong workforce  the Information website reported on Monday.

column4: UPDATE 1-Qualcomm preparing to lay off several thousand employees - tech website
column5: July 20 Chipmaker Qualcomm Inc is preparing to lay off several thousand employees  or more than 10 percent of its 30 000-strong workforce  the Information website reported on Monday.

column4: CORRECTED-Qualcomm preparing to layoff as many as several thousand employees -tech website
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  July 20 Qualcomm Inc is preparing to layoff as many as several thousand employees  tech website The Information reported on Monday.
